summary.name: Explorers
summary.description: You’re taking your first steps into a world of playful intimacy. Light, fun, and simple challenges await—perfect for breaking the ice together and sparking new sensations!

quests.content: Caress and kiss each other while standing for 2 minutes.
Write something that turns you on on a note and exchange them at the end of the next turn.
Your partner writes a sexy word on your body with their fingertips—try to guess it.
